column2: "Since I recently had requests I had to carry out, I've been running myself ragged..."
"Erm, I mean, I got the feeling that there's something inside the ruins. I can't really say what it is though."
"Maybe it's a clue for the ones we're looking for. Now I really want to try to find them."
"But, I'm still anxious to go by myself... I beg you, will you go with me?"
